description: This header file defines the 'ThunderUtils' utility class, which provides static methods for interacting with Thunder services within the WPEFramework environment. It includes functions to obtain service state and create Thunder controller clients, with necessary includes and macros.

classes.name: ThunderUtils
classes.description: A utility class with static methods for Thunder service interactions.

methods.name: uint32_t getServiceState(PluginHost::IShell * shell,const string & callsign,PluginHost::IShell::state & state)
methods.description: Retrieves the state of a Thunder service identified by its callsign, returning a status code and updating the provided state reference.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<WPEFramework::JSONRPC::LinkType<WPEFramework::Core::JSON::IElement>> getThunderControllerClient(std::string callsign="")
methods.description: Creates and returns a shared pointer to a Thunder controller client interface, optionally specified by a callsign.

ctags.name: getServiceState
ctags.pattern: /^    static uint32_t getServiceState(PluginHost::IShell* shell, const string& callsign, PluginHos/
